sentences.sContent: Or maybe finding excessive chlorofluorocarbons (if the aliens all use hairspray).
sentences.sContent_eng: Or maybe finding excessive chlorofluorocarbons (if the aliens all use hairspray).
sentences.sCn: 也许这样一来，就能够发现过量的氯氟化碳(如果外星人也使用头发定型剂的话)。

trans.tranOther: a sticky liquid that you spray on your hair to keep it in place
